statements: DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE click_through_rate < 0.5 AND conversions >= 10;
DELETE FROM campaign_performance WHERE campaign_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' OR (click_through_rate < 0.3 AND conversions < 5);
DELETE FROM click_through_rates WHERE campaign_id = 101 AND click_count < 10;
DELETE FROM click_through_rates WHERE user_id = 1 AND campaign_id = 100
DELETE FROM conversions WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_name = 'Marketing')
DELETE FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 200 AND end_date < '2023-01-01'
DELETE FROM click_through_rates WHERE user_id = 123 AND campaign_id = 456;
DELETE FROM conversions WHERE user_id = 789 AND conversion_time < '2023-01-01';
